name: Skill Capped
tag_list: gaming, e-sports, world-of-warcraft, starcraft2, strategy, instruction, training, subscription
overview:
Skill Capped features instructional content for strategy-based online games produced by professional players in the form of commentated gameplay footage, articles, guides, and direct contact with instructors.

Skill Capped currently features World of Warcraft PVP instruction. With over 5,400 accounts registerred within the first 3 months, and about 12,000 in the first year, the website has proven to be popular within the community.

Skill Capped has sponsored several players to participate in Major League Gaming tournaments in the past.
